vocabulary.name: AnaestheticGivenPostLabour/Delivery
vocabulary.Description: Anaesthetic Given Post Labour/Delivery: (This table is used by NHS ITK specification in UK only) Table type: User

concept.displayName: General anaesthetic, the administration by a doctor of an agent intended to produce unconsciousness
Epidural or caudal anaesthetic, the injection of a local anaesthetic agent into the epidural space
Spinal anaesthetic, the injection of a local anaesthetic agent into the subarachnoid space
General anaesthetic and epidural or caudal anaesthetic
Epidural or caudal and spinal anaesthetic
Anaesthetic other than in 1 to 6, or analgesic only
